thread.title: Chris Paul offers support for Lamar Odom: 'Keep fighting'
thread.title_full: Chris Paul offers support for Lamar Odom: 'Keep fighting'

title: Chris Paul offers support for Lamar Odom: 'Keep fighting'
text:
Chris Paul Offers Support To Lamar Odom Posted: Oct 14, 2015 Copy 
Rowan Kavner 
SHANGHAI, China â€“ Chris Paul issued a statement at the end of his press conference in Shanghai regarding the recent news about former Clipper Lamar Odom. 
"I wanted to extend love and support to one of our NBA brothers, Lamar Odom," Paul said. "We love you, man. Keep fighting. 
"He's a member of this fraternity, our basketball brotherhood, and we love you and we're all there for you, man." Tags
